description: The Ilyushin Il-28R is a reconnaissance aircraft. It is a development of the Il-28 medium bomber. The NATO reporting name is Beagle.
notes: Tail Guns. In addition to its fixed guns, there aircraft has a tail mount with two 23 mm NR-23 guns. It can fire into the 60- arc. It may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. Roll to hit is 3/2/1 and no modifiers apply except target size. The AtA rating is 4. The ammunition is 6.0.
Tail gunner has no ejection seat and can only bail out.
Overhead and left oblique cameras in the bomb bay
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. It may only carry twelve parachute illumination flares.

Internal fuel includes two fixed 350L wing-tip fuel tanks and larger fuselage tanks. As an exception to the normal rules for load points, internal fuel above 565 fuel points contributes 1 load point for each 50 fuel points.
